posting_body: ['Macdougal St', 'Listing ID #: 2534', 'Address: Macdougal St, #4B', 'Price: $2,700', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 3.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.5', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Virtual Doorman', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dishwasher', 'Garden', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'NO FEE', 'Outdoor Space', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'We’re marketing this place to you because we think it’s great :) Check out the list of amenities and the photos for a better idea of what this apartment has to offer Nearly all of our apartments are in centrally located sections of Brooklyn and Queens.', 'You’ll find essential business like grocery, convenience and drug stores within easy walking distance.', 'Cafes, restaurants & bars :) typically you can find fun nyc indulgences close by as well.', 'We have other NO FEE spaces we can show.', 'We’re ready & happy to help make your search as simple as possible.', 'We would love to show you around :)', 'Text 720-671-4344 mention listing ID: 2534.']
